name: Music_4038.wav
caption: This song contains a lot of digital orchestra instruments. Celli is playing a short bowed stroke chord providing rhythm along with  other cello sounds being picked in the mid range. A flute is playing a melody on top. Other string instruments are playing a plucked arpeggio melody. While timpani and cymbals are adding hits. The instruments are spread across both sides of the speakers. This song may be playing in an arcade/adventure video game.
